sentences.english: Along with being a risk factor for coronary artery disease, obesity may increase your risk of developing an arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖会增加患有冠心病的危险，由此导致心律失常。

sentences.english: The occurrent time and duration of severe arrhythmia were observed.
sentences.chinese: 以严重心律失常的发生时间和持续时间为观察指标。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Gui Gan Long Mu Tang(GGLMT)on experimental arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察桂甘龙牡汤对实验性心律失常的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the nursing of atrial tachyarrhythmia after radiofrequency current catheter ablation(RCCA) .
sentences.chinese: 目的总结导管射频消融治疗快速房性心律失常的护理。

sentences.english: Early afterdepolarizations are also responsible for the arrhythmias of congestive heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 早期去极化后也可引起充血性心衰的心律失常。

sentences.english: There was obvious relationship between type of arrhythmia and symptom of heart-throb.
sentences.chinese: 心律失常类型与心悸症状之间有明显关系。

sentences.english: The first case of arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia (ARVD) in China was reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告了国内首例致心律失常性右室发育不良病例。

sentences.english: Arrhythmia could be elicited by electrical stimulation of amygdaloid complex.
sentences.chinese: 电刺激杏仁复合体能诱发心律失常。

sentences.english: Encainide HCl is a new antiarrhythmic agent, The related substances of encainideHCI in its syntheic processes were studied.
sentences.chinese: 盐酸恩卡尼是一种新型的抗心律失常药。

sentences.english: Prolonged ventricular repolarization, an electrical conduction anomaly that could lead to heart rhythm abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 心室复极延长，一种能引起心律失常的异常电传导。

sentences.english: Grasps arrhythmia the diagnosis to have the vital clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 掌握心律失常诊断具有重要的临床意义。

sentences.english: The occurrence of arrhythmia in four card-type group in no significant differences.
sentences.chinese: 而四证型组心律失常的发生无明显差异性。

sentences.english: In addition, episodes of low blood sugar (hypoglycemia) can trigger an arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 另外，时而的低血糖发作也可能引起心律失常。

sentences.english: Object To study the effective portion in Cornus officinalis Sieb. et Zucc. extract (COE) for the treatment of arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 目的对山茱萸提取液抗心律失常有效部位进行研究。

sentences.english: The third important point is regarding antiarrhythmic therapy.
sentences.chinese: 第三个重点是关于抗心律失常治疗。

sentences.english: Conclusions The next wall myocardial infarction concurrent arrythmia are more, the mortality rate is also higher.
sentences.chinese: 结论下壁心肌梗死并发心律失常更多，死亡率也更高。

definition: atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
abbr. for 心肌梗塞[xin1 ji1 geng3 sai1], myocardial infarction/heart attack
